data.description: Dandy is transforming the massive and antiquated dental industry—an industry worth over $200B. Backed by some of the world’s leading venture capital firms, we’re on an ambitious mission to simplify and modernize every function of the dental practice through technology. As we expand our reach globally, Dandy is building the operating system for dental offices around the world—empowering clinicians and their teams with technology, innovation, and world-class support to achieve more for their practices, their people, and their patients. About Dandy Dandy is a fast-growing health-tech startup transforming the $400B dental industry through groundbreaking advances in Generative AI and robotics. We reached our first $100M in revenue in under two years—faster than companies like Uber, Slack, and Shopify—and our rapid growth has continued over the past two years. The company is backed by top-tier investors including Human Capital, Primary, Greenoaks, and General Catalyst. We’ve built the largest ML, CAD, and product/platform engineering teams in dentistry, drawing exceptional talent from leading organizations such as Google DeepMind, Amazon, and Waymo. Our full-stack engineers tackle complex challenges across platform architecture, supply-chain optimization, SaaS product development, and the core services that power our end-to-end dental workflows. At Dandy Engineering, you will Build and scale the core backend services that power ordering, case management, real-time lab workflows, and the customer-facing web apps used by thousands of dentists. Design and ship end-to-end product features - from API to UI, that improve reliability, speed, and usability across Dandy’s dentist and internal operator experiences. About Dandy Internship Internships will be in-person in our downtown Manhattan office with opportunities to learn directly from our Co-Founders, Head of Engineering, and other members of the engineering leadership team. Our internship offers equity , and provides the opportunity to convert to a full-time role. About Product + Platform Engineering Are you excited by building fast, reliable, and scalable systems that power real products used every day? Our Platform and Product Engineering teams own the core services and experiences that run Dandy’s business - from backend systems that keep orders flowing, to the web apps dentists rely on, to the internal tools that keep our labs and operations moving at speed. You’ll work across modern stacks, ship code that immediately reaches customers, and tackle problems that sit at the intersection of software, data, and real-world manufacturing. Join a team where you’ll build, iterate, and ship products that directly shape the dentist and patient experience while enabling Dandy’s rapid growth. For full-time positions, Dandy offers a wide range of best-in-class, comprehensive, and inclusive benefits tailored to each country where we operate. Our local benefits packages typically include healthcare, dental, mental health support, parental planning resources, retirement savings options, and generous paid time off—ensuring our team members are supported no matter where they live and work. Dandy is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive culture that celebrates authenticity to win as one. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, protected veteran status, citizenship or immigration status, or any other legally protected characteristics. Dandy also fully complies with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA). We are dedicated to embracing challenges and creating an accessible, inclusive workplace for all individuals. If you require any accommodations for your interview or have any questions beforehand, rest assured that we will do everything we can to meet your needs. Visit Dandy Careers for more!
